TopicTitle: Impossible to turn off engines on certain crafts

Articles.Content:
I was trying to use a VTOL plane I had flown just fine before, and now it's impossible to turn off the engines. Note that it worked fine on the previous patch.

This seems to happen on Wheesley engines when they are obstructed. I'm going to include an extremely simple, 4-part craft that I made in 30 seconds to test this behaviour yourself.

https://pastebin.com/twKS5XZg

Steps to reproduce:

1. Paste the craft in the VAB

2. Launch

3. Enable the engine

4. Disable the engine

This affects all action groups that toggle/disable the engine.

Images: https://imgur.com/a/YckR918

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
I was wondering why my F-35B recreation stopped working! Thank you for finding the exact reason.

This also applies to manually attempting to turn off the engine in part manager.

If I set the throttle to zero, then I can get the engine to turn off. Although I've also noticed the engine status and the "activate/deactivate" button getting out of sync, i.e. the engine status is "OFF" and the button is labelled "deactivate".
